description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Personal Property Valuation Expert Allowed to Testify in Hurricane Case
cases.description: The U.S. District Court - Southern District of Texas ruled defendant's Personal Property Valuation Expert Witness could opine as to whether plaintiff's insurance claim was satisfied.

cases.title: Testimony of Biomechanics Expert Witness Limited in Trampoline Injury Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Biomechanics Expert Witness was allowed to testify on the how the trampoline occurred, but not on the safety rules.

cases.title: Pharmacology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Patent Infringement Action
cases.description: The court ruled Plaintiff's Pharmacology Expert Witness could testify on defendant's statements and actions before the FDA.
